snippet.title: Trucker Horror - Horror Game Trailer #horrorgame #horror #games #truck #truckdriver #indiegame
snippet.description:
Steam -  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3565050/Trucker_Horror/

Discord -  https://discord.gg/efdgKXQMgH
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/groups/1071368974089867
Twitter - https://twitter.com/david_rudoj

About the game

The main character is a truck driver. Along the way, he finds a road that is not on the map and drives along it. On the road, abandoned cars and abandoned gas stations are a place shrouded in horror, secrets and mysteries. Soon the hero realizes that someone is watching him...

Delve into the plot, exploring gloomy locations, pick up objects and move on a truck from one point to another. To get out of the forest road. Task To get out of the forest road of horrors...
